Title: Mektoub, My Love: Canto Uno
Writer: François Bégaudeau (novel), Abdellatif Kechiche (screenplay), Ghalia Lacroix (screenplay)
Actors: Shaïn Boumedine, Ophélie Bau, Salim Kechiouche, Lou Luttiau
Plot: Amin, a young screenwriter goes to his Mediterranean home town for a summer vacation where he falls in love with Jasmine, and meets a producer who agrees to finance his first film. But when the producers wife shows interest in Amin, leaving him to decide between her, Jasmine and his career.
